processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was transferred to Special Collections on August 14, 1992.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 3 autographs from Carman Bliss.
"Very Sincerely, Carman Bliss/New Canaan Conn.," sent to Mr. Warren P. Norton of Syracuse, New York
"Bliss Carman/Twilight Park/Haines Falls/N.Y.," on a luggage tag
